meta.core_mechanic: Build a valid subway route on a 7x7 grid by sliding track tiles toward a connected path. Click a tile to pick it up and drag to a neighboring empty cell to move. AI places a tunnel obstacle periodically.

rules.text: Clear, testable rule with input/output MUST define deterministic gameplay; actions and outcomes MUST be replayable from logs.
AI MUST make a move within 2 seconds of its turn starting.
AI with difficulty 'easy' MUST use a simple heuristic move selection.
AI with difficulty 'medium' MUST use a moderate search algorithm with limited depth.
AI with difficulty 'hard' MUST use an advanced depth-search strategy with pruning.

properties.grid: 7x7 tile matrix with track slots; null for empty

actions.name: player_move
actions.result: Apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to AI; check end conditions
actions.condition: current_player == 1 AND game.status == playing AND move is valid

actions.name: ai_move
actions.result: AI calculates move using algorithm; apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to human; check end conditions

actions.name: restart
actions.result: Reset all state to initial values

setup.initial_placement: Empty board with a predefined starting path of track tiles and a few tunnel obstacles; AI will place tunnels periodically after a human move.

capture.result: When AI places a tunnel, it becomes an obstacle blocking path continuity; path checks must account for obstacles

capture_algorithm.name: apply_tunnel_block
steps: Add obstacle tile at specified coordinate
Recompute path validity for both players
If human path still exists, continue; else AI might win

scoring.winner_determination: Human wins when a connected path from left to right exists; AI wins when it blocks all possible human paths or completes its objective.

turn_flow.extra_turn_conditions: end game after two consecutive passes

validity_checks: tile must be adjacent to existing path or connected segment
tile orientation must align with existing path

acceptance.then: Captured pieces/territory update exactly as defined
acceptance.given: A valid capture exists per game rules

acceptance.then: AI uses simple algorithm, makes valid move within 2s
AI MUST block human's winning move

win.check_logic: A connected path exists from left edge to right edge using adjacent tiles

draw.check_logic: Both players have no legal moves on their turn

lose.check_logic: No possible left-to-right path exists for human due to tunnels/tiles
